1.title: Final Exam Announcement - MATH101-1
1.message:
Dear MATH101-1 students,

This is to announce that the final exam for Linear Algebra-1 will be held on:

📅 Date: October 20, 2025
⏰ Time: 03:17 PM
⏱️ Duration: 150 minutes
📍 Location: Building C Room 396

Note: This is an OPEN BOOK exam. You may bring your textbooks and notes.

Please arrive 15 minutes before the exam time. Bring your student ID and necessary writing materials.

Good luck!

Best regards,
Course Instructor
